name: Natilie
text:
We were told to wait to take the vaccine due to health issues, we were finally cleared to take...when talking to the school nurse she said she hadn't heard of the wait time after the vaccine before it becomes totally effective...as a mother with a child that has severe to moderate asthma and the fact that it's basic or common knowledge that there is always a wait time after vaccines before it becomes effective worries me that our tax dollars are being used to employ someone with such low education,critical thinking and knowledge in her field...she also told us to get a note stating this as fact from our doctor whom did not give the shot and again this is basic and common knowledge you would have to be living under a rock or a red hat or worse to have missed this....this is my son's last year of school btw
Update: unenrolled my kids they didn't even care about why I was taking them out...also they had signs posted all over the doors saying stuff about masks to protect the kids but they aren't making the kids wear masks 🤦

name: Tabetha R Burgett
text: This is the best school. My children love it!

name: Amanda Prickett
text: Very nice staff. Very informative. I'm very excited for my child to start attending.

name: Debra Mccormick
text: I went and picked up grandkids with know problem getting into the line to get them,very good and well arranged pick up line

name: Race Kirby
text: M I n. N e s o t a

name: landon shaw
text: there was a person smoking pot in the bathroom then decided to do some heroine in the lunchroom also:)

name: Ming Tian
text: great school

name: Jusitce Burden
text: I'm a student and this is a very good school. Nice teachers, nice principal. They do not cheat at games. Also the school is in great shape, they do not tolerate bullying anymore, strict rules to where bullying means you get wrote up, suspended, or expelled. I hope this changed people's minds about the school. They have improved. This a great school for children. Reading, Math, Science grades, are great! It advances students, the school is higher than average schools! Great school.

name: Magzbutler Cooks
text: I could write a long list about this school and how disappointed I am in the principal and the admissions staff (whoever that is) here, however, I will be brief. As a parent you have to advocate for your child. The team who are responsible for admissions and student success could care less, especially if your child needs a bit more counsel than others. This school has a history of favoritism lead behavior especially by the current administration and "what's in the best interest of the child" is NOT a priority. The leadership here is beyond deplorable and I refuse to give up on my child until this leadership and new metrics system/policy they have implemented is addressed. The end.

name: Robin Lewis
text: This is a great Charter school in downtown Birmingham

name: T “Lady T” CL
text: Typical BCS

name: R Dlc
text: We just moved from Memphis...people warned us beforehand that Phillips Academy was not a good school and we should just move to another area. This school is nothing special. The campus is old, dark and in need of serious repairs. The staff is very unprofessional and vague. The teachers we encountered through the application process were very rude and ugly to the parents. We decided not to go forward when we finally visited the school and saw that most of the staff and students can barely speak proper english. I do not understand the need to be secretive about the application process when students that are already accepted and attending are not even excelling. It really is sad. Upon doing further research, I saw that the reading proficiency of students is only at 50% and the math proficiency is only 47%. That is horrible. Just look at the reviews from parents and students. The comments are filled with grammar and punctuation errors. This is definitely not a good place for my 3 children.

name: A Hill
text: I love the school and teachers. My only problem is the Principal and bullying. We need a more caring and concerned person to handle our children and their problems. We have babies at this school that wants to kill themselves about being bullied,but the principal act nonchalant when he was given this information.

name: Charlene Cooper
text: Great place to learn and live the dream you chose. It's all on you! Love the staff!

text: this is a great school from personal experience but the 6th grade social studies teacher Mrs.Tucker is very rude and unprofessional.
